answers.answer: My counselor is a *she not a he sorryyyy.

Sorry I can't help you.. I've never been through it. But I am 25 weeks and going to be tested soon.. I've only gained 9 pounds so far.. but did you get Gd BC you gained so much weight? I'm freaking out that I'm going to have it. Makes me so nervous.. since you have it maybe you can answer my questions..

I had gestational diabetes with my last pregnancy and actually lost 15lbs due to the diet. I weighed 260 after I lost the weight so my Dr was happy. I had also felt unattractive but my hubby was there to reassure me that I was still hott only cuz my boobs are a 42F. Im on only 5'1 but im thick I guess lol. As long as you are healthy and your BP is good your baby should be fine. I know it's hard not to worry but try. You can always go back to normal with diet and exercise. Anything is possible if you really want it.
Yes i.got it while pregnant for eating so much/: i never use to.be.like.this i never let food take over me lol. Its horrible/:

question: Iam.32+2 and i have destantional diabetes that i got while pregnant.  i also have gained just about 80 pounds from.what my doctor says. ..i used to weigh 160-170 around there and now i weigh 240 something i feel horrible, i feel bad that iam putting me and my son in danger..i feel fat and i feel ugly... i feel my baby boy is not safe inside of me, is there any other lady's who went through this or is going through this? I just feel so depressed and stressed over this situation. And iam seening a councler for my issues but i feel he dont understand me fully cause shes never been pregnant. And my sister or mom never went through this...i just need.to know that iam not the.only one.you know? I just want my on out where he is safe and i can go back to normal.
title: vent/weight
